description: Data for the speaker used in dialogues

version.description: The version number for the speaker file format.

name.description: A readable name for the speaker.

assetPath.description: The path to the asset to use for the speaker's sprite.

flipX.description: Whethever to flip X axis of this speaker.

flipY.description: Whethever to flip Y axis of this speaker.

isPixel.description: Whether to disable anti-aliasing for the dialogue box speaker.

offsets.description: The global offset to the speaker's position, in pixels.

scale.description: The scale to apply to the sprite.

offsets.description: Offset from the speaker's real position when playing this animation.

flipY.description: Whethever to flip Y axis of this speaker when playing this animation.

frameRate.description: How many frames to play of this animation in 1 second.

prefix.description: Prefix of all frames making up this animations. Optional for 'Packer' props.

name.description: A name of this speaker's animation.

looped.description: Whethever this animation should repeat itself after it finishes.

flipX.description: Whethever to flip X axis of this speaker when playing this animation

frameIndices.description: A list of frame numbers to use for this animation. Empty list will use all available frames.
